question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Who is the most overrated world leader?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "Barack Obama", "modifiers": {"bold": true, "italic": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-ddab0a7e81e48d13ea7f2c9ec7c1b46e", "height": 3356, "width": 2687, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-5c063487628793a6c98ddf66090c2a08-c", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Barack Obama, whilst not in office anymore, was without a doubt the most overrated world leader of the modern era whose only real defining feature was being the first black president.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "He failed to make a real effect on social change in society and racism in America is more rampant.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Obamacare failed to live up to its promises though I admit this isn\u2019t entirely his fault.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "He was responsible for civilian deaths in the Middle East by drone strikes.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Economic growth was slow and he failed to address the economic failures of modern America.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "He didn\u2019t significantly tackle climate change nor poverty in America. He didn\u2019t do anything about solving massive corporate cronyism in the American political system.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "He was underwhelming to say the least and didn\u2019t do anything to stop the decline of American politics and society into a fractured society.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}
